title: MMA: 'Joker in the pack' Alfie Davis plots Usman Nurmagomedov and coach Khabib Nurmagomedov's downfall
desc: Britain's Alfie Davis says he is the "joker in the pack" as he looks to defeat the unbeaten Usman Nurmagomedov for the PFL lightweight title in Dubai on Saturday.

title: Inside the demise of Syria’s Kurdish autonomy
desc: BEHIND THE LINES: The arrival of Syrian forces to Qamishli sets the seal on the effective demise of the Kurdish-led Autonomous Administration of North and East Syria (AANES).

title: SBI Q3 results: Standalone profit jumps 24% YoY; NII increases 9% but NIM slips
desc: SBI Q3 results: SBI's profit jumped 24.5% YoY to ₹21,028.15 crore from ₹16,891.44 crore in the same quarter last year. It was SBI's highest-ever quarterly net profit. Total income rose 9.7% YoY to ₹1,40,914.65 crore from ₹1,28,467.39 crore in the same quarter last year.
